short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful app to export and import the Salesforce Dependent Picklist Matrix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beta Feature: Import Dependency matrix.

NOTE: Some users have reported that the extension does not work for them if they are using VPN or proxy. Please check if this is the case for you as well and try without VPN/proxy.

Some users have reported that the exported file does not have complete data. In all these cases, the data is trimmed after a special character (for example '+' or any other character). I am not able to replicate this issue on my end so can not fix it. If you face similar issue and willing to spend time to resolve this with me, please contact by email.

Why you need this app?

Salesforce does not provide any feature to export and import the Dependent Picklist Matrix. This extension has the following features:

1. Export the dependency matrix as a CSV file for analysis, reporting, documentation and comparison. 

2. Set the dependent picklist values for a controlling field by importing a CSV file.

3. Validate the changes made to the dependency matrix against the existing setup.

4. Compare the dependency matrix across Salesforce orgs.

Compatibility:
- Supported in Classic
- Supported in Lightning

Demo : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrMLqBj5YBQ

License: 
This extension requires a paid license key and offers a free 7-day free trial. Get the license at https://store.sfdcproducthunt.com/l/sfmatrixext

NOTE: Tested to work when user language is set to English. The picklist values can be of any language.

Support: 
You can support the app development here:  https://buymeacoffee.com/maninders
For any queries contact by email.

Sept (v0.0.11)
- Add support for salesforce-setup.com pages

August (v0.0.10)
- Added Beta feature for importing the dependency matrix

July 2024 (v0.0.9)
- App now works even when the user does not have edit permission to update the matrix.

17/03/2023 (v0.0.8)
- The csv file now contains all values of the matrix with INCLUDED/EXCLUDED flag for each

v0.0.6:
- Fixed bugs, modified UI and added Licensing

v 0.0.4:
- Added support for "View All" for more than 5000 entries.

v 0.0.2:
- bug fixes
